rukus.text: Disasters stern land mar ki popol committed Li tiel lets them gust consequences de kelk da their works ili return (al des tuj works)
Dir Roam ter not consequences those antaux vi. Plej de them est idol worshipers
Do vi devote completely this perfekt religi tag ven which far inevitable DI! Ke tag ili shocked
Whoever disbelieves disbelieves detriment his own anim while those plumb righteous life do tial strengthen develop their own anim
Li generously recompense those kred plumb righteous life el His bounties! Li ne am disbelievers
(Among His proofs est ti Li send vent bon omen dusx vi kun His mercy allow sxip kur mar en accordance kun His regul kaj vi streb His bounties commerce) vi est appreciative
Ni send messengers vi their popol profound sign. Subsequently ni pun those transgressed est our duty ni grant victory believers
DI EST UNU SEND VUND EMOCI NUB STERN CXIEL en accordance kun His VOL! Li tiam piles nub tiam vi seg pluv ven therefrom When gxi auxtun whomever Li chooses His servants ili gxoj
Gxi fal them ili resorted despair
Vi sxat di continuous mercy kaj kiel Li revives land est dead Li do gxi just as certainly resurrect dead Li est Omnipotent
Hav ni send them instead flav sandstorm ili ad disbelieve
Vi ne far dead nor surd auxd vok once ili turn
Nor can vi direkt blind their straying Vi nur auxd those kred en our revelations decid igx submitters
